name: filter_group_giveaways
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool gamerpower.
Tool description: Find all free games, loot and giveaways with this giveaway tracker API powered by GamerPower.com! Access programmatically the best giveaways in gaming!
API description: Filters and groups giveaways based on the provided platform and type, using the provided API key to make the request.

platform.description: The platform for which to filter the giveaways (e.g., 'pc', 'ps4', 'xbox').

type.description: The type of giveaway to filter (default is 'game.loot').
